title: EP:78 Genesis: "The Birth of Bangin"
itunes:title: EP:78 Genesis: "The Birth of Bangin"
description:
We have the founder of the Eiht Tray Crips Melvin Farmer and Compton original Blood Piru Ayatollah Marv in studio to break down the history of the Crips and Bloods. They go into detail about how the sets were birthed out the Black Panther movement, How Countelpro strategically killed the pro-black movement and how because of their young age they moved through the hood with impunity.

Question of the week

Did you vote, if you did, tell us who you voted for and why, and if you didn't vote tell us why? Shoot us your answers to our Instagram page. @Thegangsterchroniclespodcast We will send 10 people that respond some Gangster Chronicles merch.

TAP IN

Follow us on Instagram @Thegangsterchroniclespodcast

Subscribe to our YouTube channel https://rb.gy/kx8e4g

Subscribe to our website for free exclusive content not found anywhere else http://www.OGGangsterChronicles.com

Learn more about your ad-choices at https://www.iheartpodcastnetwork.com

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
